product_name: Merrell Travel All Laptop Bag - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Cookies or cake? Window or aisle? Some decisions are hard but, thanks to removable shoulder straps, the Merrell Travel All laptop bag doesn't make you choose between a backpack and a briefcase. Removable backpack straps stow away in their own zippered pocket on rear panel; haul handles on top and side provide additional carry options for short trips. Structured, padded main compartment holds clothes for a weekend getaway. Padded laptop sleeve fits computers up to 15 in. Ripstop polyester exterior features a Durable Water Repellent that resists stains and light rain. Internal zippered mesh pocket; 2 external zippered pockets; adjustable, removable shoulder strap allows cross-body carrying. Overstock.
short_description: Cookies or cake? Window or aisle? Some decisions are hard but, thanks to removable shoulder straps, the Merrell Travel All laptop bag doesn't make you choose between a backpack and a briefcase.
